jade.fov
Class FoV.FoVFactory

java.lang.Object
  jade.fov.FoV.FoVFactory
Enclosing interface:
FoV
public static class FoV.FoVFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Used for retrieving varius singleton instances of FoV implementing classes.

Method Detail

get

public static FoV get(int algorithm)
Returns a instance implementing FoV based on the specified algorithm.

Parameters:
algorithm - the algorithm to be implemented. Static integer constants are provided in FoV
Returns:
a singleton instance of an object implementing FoV with specified algorithm
